NMI Vector

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x420
Size:
0x4

Description

32-bit register providing the jump vector for RISC-V to transition for NMI handling code. Default is the base address of ROM, but may be updated for enhanced handling by runtime images. Bit [0] is ignored to enforce half-word alignment of address. Writes available to Caliptra subsystem, not SoC.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] vector rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

vector

NMI Vector
